SYN_3_1_8358:
Indication: Left mainstem obstruction (Wegener's).
Procedure: Rigid bronchoscopy, APC, Balloon Dilation, Fibrin Glue, Chest Tube.
Findings: LMS 90-100% stenosed. Attempted recanalization (knife, balloon, APC, coring).
Complication: Visualization of pulsatile vessel (PA) via false lumen. No rupture.
Action: Fibrin glue applied. Procedure aborted. Patient intubated. Chest tube (14F) placed for pneumothorax.
Plan: ICU. CT Surgery consult. CT Chest.
